heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy north, with scattered snow showers, mainly late. Partly cloudy south, with the chance of a snow shower from the southern Greens westward. Lows from 5 to 15 above, cold spots around zero. Light winds, variable to south.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy north, with scattered snow showers, mainly late. Partly cloudy south, with the chance of a snow shower from the southern Greens westward. Lows from 5 to 15 above, cold spots around zero. Light winds, variable to south.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny in the south. Morning snow showers likely in the north, then decreasing afternoon clouds. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Partly to mostly sunny in the south. Morning snow showers likely in the north, then decreasing afternoon clouds. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: Partly cloudy south. Mostly cloudy north, with a the chance of a snow shower, mainly in the mountains. Lows zero to 10 above, cold spots around 5 below. Northwest 5 to 10 mph and diminishing.
